snippet: After seven years in the job, the top executive of the retailer will be succeeded in February by Art Peck, currently digital chief.
abstract: Gap says its chief executive Glenn Murphy will step down in February 2015, to be succeeded by Art Peck, who now leads its digital division.
lead_paragraph: After seven years in the job, the top executive of the retailer will be succeeded in February by Art Peck, currently digital chief.

headline.seo: Glenn Murphy to Retire as Gap Chief
headline.main: After Turnaround, Gap’s Chief Executive to Retire
headline.print_headline: After Turnaround, Gap’s Chief Executive to Retire
